name: Project Genestealer
description:
Project: Genestealer is a hobby game I am making about a faction from Warhammer 40k: the Genestealer Cults! Drop by reddit.com/r/projectgenestealer if you want more updates about the project! Thanks!

- James

Disclaimer: I am in no way affiliated with Games Workshop, this is purely a fan-made project.
